journals.notes: Was it added in legacy or delivered from etmain?
Added. Afaik, etmain doesn't have any voice sound at startup.
I think this is about text as well. How about it?
I think the text is adequate, but maybe you have a better suggestion?

> I agree that this announcement doesn’t fit the atmosphere of our mod, but we will first have to find one that does in order to replace it. Feel free to create a feature request.
I think we are not going to find a fitting announcement, so we should use a sound effect instead. My ideas:

# Possibly a military drum roll? 
# Trumpet? 
# Civil defence siren?

Make your own suggestion. There are plenty of those kind of sound effects on the internet.
And I think it would be a good idea to change the end of map music to a Wehrmacht march when the axis win and the liberty march music when the allies win.
Isn't such stuff forbidden in Germany?

Some lyrics are forbidden in germany but I can't imagine a march itself.

+1 for the marches

To show our deepest respect to all victims of ww2 and we distance ourself from any racist background we might add a text on the winning screen. I think these words should also be spread in the wiki. On first view many people are gettting the impression ET is a nazi game.

> I think we are not going to find a fitting announcement, so we should use a sound effect instead. 

Absolutely. I was watching the "Redemption video":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FnE8sPfzxig the other day, and I was thinking a similar "bell" sound (actually part of the sound track) that happens at startup would be perfect.

Also, +1 for a drum sound instead of the "prepare to fight".  

> To show our deepest respect to all victims of ww2 and we distance ourself from any racist background we might add a text on the winning screen. I think these words should also be spread in the wiki. On first view many people are gettting the impression ET is a nazi game.

Yes, I actually believe this is important. We could also use the exit screen to display such a text. It actually shows a duplicate of the original credits.

EDIT: We should also replace the mono sound by stereo sound version (implement #398 first).

Now that we have actual plane flying, maybe an air raid siren ("example(example)":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=msX8iULEQgA) could work.
Jaymod has a better fitting "beep" in warmup that could be played in the last seconds too.

subject: Replace quake3 style announcer
description:
From the forums: http://dev.etlegacy.com/boards/3/topics/632

"[...]The quake 3 style announcer ("Prepare to fight...FIGHT!") [...] wasn’t in the original, and imo it doesn’t fit for this game."
